column1: beaten. Length ball outside off, Stirling pushes at it with no feet
fuller and driven down the ground but Naveen goes low in his followthrough to make the stop
fuller on the pads, flicked towards short midwicket
and he strikes in his first over. Length ball around off, Stirling looks to clear the mid-off but doesn't get the timing right. Nabi pedals back a couple of steps and takes it with reverse cups
length around off, pushes it towards cover-point
a slower one but too full. Drives it through cover and point. Ireland off the mark
starts with a googly, fuller outside off, O'Brien looks to go for a drive, inside edge towards square leg
down the leg side, goes for the sweep but fails to connect. Gets a bye as the keeper makes a partial stop
length ball around off, pushes it back towards the bowler
length outside off, goes down and sweeps it behind square leg, the fielder in the deep puts in a desperate dive but cannot stop it
length around off, drives it towards covers, Rashid makes a diving stop
length ball on the stumps, punches it towards short midwicket
fuller outside off, pushes it towards cover-point and sets off. A direct hit at the bowler's end and Balbirnie would have been out
off stump takes a walk. Length ball but Balbirnie stays inside the line of the ball and looks to target the cover region. Misses and a cartwheel on display
length ball in the channel. Left alone by Delany
slower one on the stumps, pushes it down the wicket. Naveen throws himself to his right but cannot stop, mid-on though cuts it off
length outside off, punches it square of the wicket, cannot beat the point fielder
length ball around off, stays in his crease and defends
once again straying down the leg side, goes for the sweep but only a single to short fine leg
length ball on the stumps, punches it towards long-on
fuller around off, chipped uppishly but over covers, runs away to the boundary
driven towards long-on for another single
length ball at the stumps, backs away exposing his stumps. Goes for the cut and misses
length ball outside off, connects the cut but a diving stop by Naveen at backward point
shot! Great placement as well. A little bit of width outside off, cuts it between point and short third man
length ball down the leg side, goes for the swipe but misses. Called a wide
fuller outside off, driven through covers this time, another boundary for O'Brien
length ball around off, stays in his crease and defends
slower one around off, taps it towards covers and sets off
length ball angling in. Defends it towards cover from the crease
Nabi misfields at mid-off and concedes a boundary. A length ball outside off, backs away and flat-bats to the right of Nabi but he fails to stop it
length ball on middle and leg, pushes it towards long-on
a googly but width outside off, backs away and cuts it to the right of the point fielder
just over Nabi at mid-off. Delany backs away and goes aerial this time. Nabi jumps and perhaps got his fingertips to it but that's all
over long-on this time, no width from Mujeeb so Delany goes leg side, all the way for a six
backs away again, this time into the ground. Nabi makes the stop at mid-off
tucked away towards short midwicket for a single to bring up the fifty for Ireland at the end of the powerplay
length ball around off, drives it towards sweeper cover
length ball outside off, slices it towards point
short of length but way outside off, called a wide
too full outside off, squeezes it out towards point where Najibullah Zadran makes the stop
short of length outside off, goes for the upper cut but misses
length outside off, slashes hard. Gets a thick outside edge through the vacant first-slip region
slower one, stays back and slices it towards sweeper cover
length ball around off, spinning big. Delany goes for the cut but gets an under-edge through the keeper's legs
length ball around off, use of feet to push it towards covers, a fumble there allows an easy single
slower in the air. A touch fuller around off, comes forward and pushes it towards cover-point
length ball outside off, mistimes the cut into the ground. Dribbles towards the bowler
length ball around off, skids off the surface. Pushes towards long-off
another big-spinning legbreak. Goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
length ball at the batsman who was backing away. Is cramped but manages a single to long-on
fuller outside off, drives it square of the wicket and gets a boundary
gives himself room once again and drives it towards deep extra cover, fielder there
looks to go aerial but the bowler follows him, mistimes towards wide long-on and they come back for the second run
length much wider this time, reaches out and gets a single to deep cover
slower length ball around middle and off. O'Brien backs away and drives it towards deep extra cover
and he provides that breakthrough. Maiden T20I wicket for Qais. Tossed up around off, O'Brien looks to go aerial but doesn't get it from the middle. Rashid settles under it at long-off
looked like a googly, from outside off. Works it towards wide mid-on
length ball around off, pushed towards cover-point who has a shy at the bowler's end. The non-striker was easily back and Ireland get an overthrow
a touch shorter in length, punches it towards sweeper cover
falls well short of Naveen at point. Tossed up outside off, goes for the drive but gets a thick outside edge. Was in the air but doesn't carry
fuller on the stumps, pushed towards the non-striker, Qais dives across but cannot get a hand but the ball hits the non-striker and stops there
fuller around off, driven towards long-on
length ball around off, backs away and looks to hit it hard towards long-on. Not the best of the timings
fuller around off, a big front-foot stride to drive it towards long-on
length ball at the stumps, backs away and goes aerial but not from the middle of the bat. Ends up skying it over mid-off. Nabi takes a couple of steps back and pouches it
fuller around off, pushes it towards extra cover where they take an easy single. A fumble by Nabi but no extra run
flighted around off, driven straight towards Nabi this time
flighted outside off, goes for a drive but gets a thick outside edge over cover-point. Mujeeb puts in the slide at the boundary but makes a mess of it
cuts it towards sweeper cover, straight to Mujeeb this time
tossed up outside off, drives it towards long-off
a sharp legbreak, Tector pushes at it and gets an outside edge towards short third man
and comes out the reverse sweep, between first slip and backward point for four
fuller around off, drives it towards wide long-off but Rashid moves quickly to keep it to one
down the track but Rashid slips in a googly. Much shorter so the batsman can just push it towards long-on
too full at the stumps, drives it towards extra cover
fuller outside off, hit hard along the ground but only a single to long-off
length ball around off, stays back and pushes it towards the bowler
length ball around off, flicked towards short midwicket but the keeper sprints towards the ball and keeps it to one
lofted over long-on. Naveen moves to his left and puts in the jump, stretches his right hand out but cannot get a hand to the ball
length ball at the stumps, flicked towards short midwicket for one
length ball around off, pushes it towards short third man
moves across and sweeps. Misses and is hit on the pads but the impact is outside off
reverse sweep to short third man for a quick single
gives himself some room and looks to go over extra cover. Misses and Mujeeb hits
length ball outside off, Getkate looks to push at it but misses
fuller on the pads, flicked towards fine leg
length ball around off, looks to push at it but it spins away
fuller around off, hits it in the air towards long-off
tossed up outside off, driven but Nabi makes a diving stop at extra cover
length ball on the pads, flicked away towards short fine leg
a googly outside off, looks to smash down the ground but misses
length outside off and moving away, Tector goes for the cut and misses
slower one, hoicked towards deep midwicket
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards long-on
fuller on the stumps and Tector launches it over long-on, a big six
takes a couple of steps towards the bowler and cuts this slower one towards backward point
another slower one, backs away and cuts it towards wide long-off
a legbreak outside off, looks for the slog sweep and gets beaten as it turns away from him
length outside off, punches it towards cover-point
length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
fuller around off, goes over the bowler's head, was in the air for a long time but lands before the long-off fielder could reach there
fuller around off and middle. Tector goes for a slog sweep but fails to middle. Najib comes in from deep midwicket and takes the catch
length ball at the stumps, another slog sweep. Much better connection but it's flat. Najib pedals back a but and takes it reverse cups. Qais finishes with 3 for 25 on debut
slower bouncer, Simi Singh was fooled by it. Too early into the shot and gets beaten
slower length ball around off, tucked away towards square leg. The bowler himself does the fielding
fuller outside off, McCarthy fails to get the bat on it
slower length ball, looks to go over mid-off but cannot clear Rashid as he ends up slicing it. Naveen gets his third
fuller and wide outside off, Simi tries to reach out but no connection
down the track but it's a slower one on a length around off, worked towards square leg
length ball on middle and leg, flicked towards midwicket
tossed up googly around off, looks to drive but is beaten as the ball spins in. An appeal for lbw but denied, but that looked very close
fuller on the stumps, chipped towards long-on
short of length outside off, cuts it towards deep point
a dipping full-toss, looks to drive but the ball hits the inside edge and beats short fine leg
length outside off, cuts it to the right of backward point
slower legcutter outside off, looks to go big down the ground and gets beaten
another slower one outside off, swipes it over the ball and misses again
third slower ball in a row, much shorter this time, turns it towards square leg
down the track and drives it towards long-on, Nabi moves to his left, gets low and pushes it inside
back-of-the-hand slower one but way too outside off
slower again, goes for the slog sweep but gets a top edge over the keeper's head, much-needed four runs
down the track and flat-bats it towards long-off. Rashid fires in the throw but it's wide and they complete the second
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks
length ball around middle and leg, backs away and looks to punch on the off side, an inside edge on to the pads
tossed up outside off, looks to go over extra cover, misses
punched towards covers off the back foot
fuller on the toes, clipped towards deep square leg, a desperate effort by Tector near the boundary to pull it back, saves two
fuller on the leg once again, flicked towards midwicket
length ball around off, drops it towards covers for a quick single
fuller around off, gets behind it and defends
fuller around off, pushes it down the ground but bowler dives across and gets a hand to it
short of length outside off, cuts it towards deep point
length ball outside off, goes for a wild slog but misses
fuller on the stumps, flicked away in front of square leg
tossed up on the stumps and launched over long-on for a big six
shortens his length, stays back and tucks it towards midwicket
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards square leg
length outside off, mistimes the cut towards extra cover
short outside off, rocks back and smashes it over deep square leg
length ball around off, stays back and tucks it towards midwicket
length ball around off, pushed towards covers
down the track but gets too close to the ball, digs it out towards extra cover
shuffles across, Simi fires one down the leg side and swept fine for four
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards midwicket
length ball around off, punched towards long-on
too full outside off and launched over long-off, a powerful hit by Gurbaz
fuller around off, defended
fuller outside off, looks to go over extra cover, gets a thick outside edge towards third man. A sliding stop there to save the boundary
short of length around off, hops and dabs it on the off side
length ball on the pads, flicked towards short fine leg
length ball around middle and off, a half-pull but it lands just ahead of Balbirnie at short midwicket
fuller outside off and smashed past the mid-off fielder for four
fuller on the pads and whipped away, beats the deep square leg to his left
slower one around off, pushes it towards short midwicket
fuller on the stumps, goes for the yorker but just misses his mark. Works it towards long-on
short of length on the pads, tucked away towards short fine leg
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards square leg
short and pulled away in the gap between fine leg and deep square leg, Like Ireland, Afghanistan too bring up the fifty in the powerplay
length ball at the batsman, punched towards short midwicket
down the track but mistimes it. Once again drops in front of Balbirnie at short midwicket
goes for the pull but mistimes it, the ball doesn't go anywhere
quicker one around off. A length ball and defended from the crease
quick again, pushes it to the left of the bowler who fails to stop it
pushed towards wide long-on on this occasion
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
shortens his length as the batsman charges down. Pushed on the off side
goes for a sweep this time, a single to deep midwicket
length ball on the pads, flicked towards short fine leg
goes for the slog sweep, and finds the gap between fine leg and deep square leg
a legbreak from Simi Singh. Goes back and pulls it in front of square leg
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards long-on
fuller on the stumps, Gurbaz goes for the big hit but fails to middle it and holes out at deep midwicket. He is distraught with his dismissal
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards short midwicket
a googly attacking the stumps, Ghani stays back and is cramped. Just manages to get his bat on it
goes for a big hit over midwicket but doesn't the required distance. Tector with another catch as Delany gets two in the over
length ball down the leg side, misses the flick and is hit on the pads
length outside off, looks to play it with the hands and misses
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards short midwicket
length ball around off, stays back and hammers it through extra cover for four
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards short midwicket where Simi makes a diving stop
fuller around off, looks to push and gets a thick outside edge
fuller on the stumps, pushed towards mid-on for a quick single
legbreak goes wrong. Too short and dispatched over wide long-on for a maximum

another legbreak, on a length outside off, pushes it towards covers, Asghar wants a single but is sent back. A direct hit and he would have been out. By the time Simi breaks the stumps, Asghar was just in
pushed towards long-on
goes for the sweep and gets a single to deep square leg
short of length outside off, punched towards sweeper cover
down the track and launches it over long-off for the second six of the over
short of length around off, opens the face of the bat to work it past cover
length ball around off, tucked towards short midwicket
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards deep square leg
short and pulled away towards deep midwicket
fuller around off, driven towards long-on
short and pulled fine this time, beats the fine leg
fuller around off, flicked towards midwicket
backs away to this length ball and looks to smash it through covers. Misses and the woodwork is disturbed
length ball outside off, dabs it towards third man to get off the mark
fuller and driven towards long-on
length ball around off, Nabi was caught at the crease. Gets a leading edge that falls on the off side
length ball moving away from the batsman, Nabi was looking to hit it down the ground, misses
fuller around off, turns it towards short midwicket
short of length, hops and works it towards fine leg
length ball around off, chops it towards point
short and wide, goes for the cut and misses
length ball around off, pulls it towards backward square leg
length ball around off, pushed towards mid-on, the bowler does the fielding himself
length, well outside off, pulls it towards short midwicket
short and wide, cuts it towards sweeper cover
fuller and wider, goes aerial over covers, there is a man in the deep and keeps it to two
goes for the another big shot and holes out at long-on. Was a legbreak, short and there to be hit. Nabi though ends up top-edging the pull
length ball around off and angling in, Najib goes for a reverse sweep but misses and is hit on the pads. A big appeal and the finger goes up. Simi Singh on a hat-trick
fuller around off, drives it towards long-off
length outside off, pushes at it and gets beaten
short of length outside off, pulls it towards midwicket
fuller on the leg stump, goes deep and looks to hit over midwicket, misses
bouncer around off, pulled down towards midwicket
short of length outside off, pulls it in front of square leg
length ball outside off, turns it towards square leg
fuller on the stumps, stays back and flicks it towards square leg
length ball on the stumps, looks to flick but misses. Struck on the pads, looked very close but no appeal there
dropped. Short and pulled towards deep square leg, one of the easier chances for Getkate but he lets it through his hands and to the boundary
goes for the pull but mistimes. The ball drops near the cover
short of length and another pull, only a single to midwicket
fuller around off, driven towards long-off
fuller and wider, throws his bat at it, more from the outer half of the bat but in the gap, sweeper cover cannot cut it off
length but down the leg side, a wide
length outside off, pulled towards midwicket
fuller outside off, driven but straight towards extra cover
fuller and wider, Asghar looks to reach out but it just sneaks under his bat. Wasn't far away from being a wide
length outside off, goes for the cut but mistimes it towards extra cover
fuller and wider but too far away this time, called a wide
another one bowled full and wide, Naib fails to get bat on this
length wide outside off, throws hit bat at it and gets it over cover. Sweeper keeps it to one
length ball around off, goes for the pull but doesn't get the timing right. Another single, this time to deep midwicket
slower one. Fuller outside off, moves across and target deep midwicket. Not from the middle of the bat, one more to deep midwicket
Naib goes for a slog to a length ball, misses and the stumps are disturbed
length ball around off, goes deep and looks to target leg side but ends up slicing it over mid-off, the fielder runs backwards but cannot reach there
length outside off, clears the front leg but ends up dragging it towards long-on
fuller outside off, Rashid goes down on one knee and hits it towards sweeper cover, only a single
dropped. Fuller and wider, Asghar goes aerial over covers. Extra cover and sweeper cover converging, they collide and spill it in the end. Balbirnie isn't happy
fuller and wider again, looks to go over cover once again but fails to middle. Balbirnie back-pedals and takes it comfortably this time. But the batsmen have crossed, so it will be Rashid on strike
fuller and wider outside off, goes for the drive but too wide
bowls the length ball and Rashid just smokes it over long-on, a huge hit
another wide outside off, that plan is backfiring for Ireland
brilliant this time. A wide yorker and Rashid fails to get his bat on it
fuller outside off, slices it over covers, deep backward point cannot cut it off. That's four. We have a Super Over on our hands
